roleset.name: break, cause to not be whole

example.name: break-v: just transitive
example.text: Stock prices rallied as the Georgia-Pacific bid broke the market's recent gloom.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG3
example.text: Then the big waves began to break the back of the ship to pieces .

example.name: break-n
example.text: his apparent break with his old mentor , Mr. Honecker
example.arg: with his old mentor , Mr. Honecker

example.name: make_break-l
example.text: By *PRO* making a break from tradition , Brooks Brothers is seeking adelicate balance .

example.name: break-n
example.text: The dam's break was probably caused by defective materials.

example.name: breaking-n: args 0, 1
example.text: His breaking of the mirror indicates the nothingness of the divinity of kingship and his rejection of it.

example.name: broken-j
example.text: The system is broken

example.name: broken-j: args0, 1
example.text: His body was broken from the attack, and he lay motionless.

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls split-23.2, hurt-40.8.3-1-1, break-45.1. (from break-v.01)
BREAK-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb break.01, OntoNotes grouping break-n senses 3, 6, 9, 10; Framed by Claire. (from break-n.01)
BREAKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, 'break-n.01'. (from breaking-n.01)
BROKEN-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, break-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls split-23.2, hurt-40.8.3-1-1, break-45.1. (from broken.01-j)

roleset.name: break_in: gain entry

example.name: break-v: not exactly a robbery
example.text: [All of Japan's so-called Big Four securities firms]-1 have suffered setbacks in their attempts *trace*-1 to break into foreign markets.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: And thieves can break into your house and steal them .

example.name: break_in-v
example.text: I didn't think I had much time, so I broke in, figuring I'd get a few hours, maybe a day before they clear out all of this stuff.
example.arg: I didn't think I had much time
figuring I'd get a few hours, maybe a day before they clear out all of this stuff

example.name: break_in-n
example.text: Ginny smiled; she remembered Harry telling her about his break-in into the Lestrange vault.

example.name: break_in-n
example.text: the Cabinet will convene , the Council of Ministers , and demand ah and we give authorization to the Lebanese army to perform break - ins

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: No VN class. (from break-v.02)
BREAK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. No VNcls. (from break-n.06)
Include 'in' in the rel where possible.

roleset.name: happen, come to light, onset, beginning

example.name: break-v
example.text: Before the scandal broke, he was getting more than 30% support in...

example.name: break-n: corpus example
example.text: Come day break , I 'll be here by your side

example.name: break-n: break of dawn
example.text: I waited until the break of dawn.

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. Member of VNcls appear-48.1.1. (from break-v.13)
BREAK-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from break-v.15)
BREAK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. (from break-n.07)

roleset.name: separate one entity from another

role.descr: secondary predication on arg0 (free, loose, etc)

example.name: break-v: break free
example.text: We've helped people break free of the welfare cycle.

example.name: break-v: break loose
example.text: A cow broke loose from a temporary pen and ran around a field and toward a playground during the spring carnival at Baywood Elementary
example.arg: during the spring carnival at Baywood Elementary

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Member of VNcls split-23.2, break-45.1. (from break-v.16)

roleset.name: violate (the law, an oath, trust, etc)

example.name: break-v: both args
example.text: If there are problems in the future , who will then be the one breaking the " law " ?

example.name: break-n
example.text: Also if she does go and take me to small claims, could I counter sue for loss wages due to her break of the verbal contract?

example.name: break-n: break a taboo
example.text: >[Normally superstitious people]-1 were willing *T*-1 to break the strong taboo associated with coffins because of the double allusion to the phrase " sheng guan fa cai "
example.arg: the strong taboo associated with coffins

example.name: breaking-n: both args
example.text: These stipulated that [companies]-1 would be given grades according to the quantity of their exports and their records of *T*-1 breaking customs regulations .

roleset.note: NOTES: Relates to lawbreak.01. This frame is taken from a particular sense of the former break-v.01, break-n.01 and breaking-n.01 rolesets. Reframing by Julia.

roleset.name: to suspend an action, take a break from something, pause, musical interlude

role.descr: purpose of pause, interrupted for or with what

example.name: break-n: arg2
example.text: The program was aired in its entirety without commercial breaks.2

example.name: break-n: with arg1, TMP
example.text: a midweek break from their recent wild gyrations

example.name: break-n: arg1, oblique arg0
example.text: These breaks of concentration from all the interruptions won't help me finish the work on time.

example.name: break-n: arg1
example.text: We made a dash for the car during a brief break in the rainstorm.

example.name: break-n: argMs, arg0
example.text: It's a very difficult break for solo flute.

roleset.note: BREAK-N NOTES: Based on OntoNotes grouping break-n senses 1 & 11; no equivalent PB verb, no relevant mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from break-n.02)

roleset.name: Break into motion, for a goal or from a source location

example.name: break-n
example.text: It was the largest break from a federal prison in decades.

example.name: make_break-l
example.text: At recess the children made a break for the playground.

example.name: make_break-l
example.text: The man has made several jail breaks but was always recaptured.

example.name: make_break-l
example.text: Nirupama, a bright young journalist, had made her break for freedom from the prison walls of home and feudal society.
example.arg: from the prison walls of home and feudal society

roleset.note: BREAK-N NOTES: Based on OntoNotes grouping break-n senses 7 & 8; no equivalent PB verb, no relevant mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from break-n.03)
No example found of all arguments co-occuring.

roleset.name: notable occurance; point at which one's luck turns (bad break, lucky break, etc)

example.name: break-n: arg1
example.text: There has been the first break in the case

example.name: break-n: arg0
example.text: ... KHS Musical Company used to organize an annual campus rock band competition where many singers and bands got their first big break , including Chang Yu - sheng , Tai Cheng - hsiao , and The Orient Express .

example.name: break-n: luck changes for the worse
example.text: Herbert's bad break in heavy Bradford Bulls defeat

roleset.note: BREAK-N NOTES: Added by Julia base on more-nouns, OntoNotes sense 5. No VNcls. (from break-n.05)

roleset.name: separate, withdraw, secede

example.name: break_away-v
example.text: He-1 wished *-1 to break away from the all-pervasive practice of * reporting aboriginal affairs from a purely Han Chinese perspective...
example.arg: from the all-pervasive paractice of * reporting aboriginal affairs from a purely Han Chinese perspective

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena (from break-v.14)

roleset.name: break down: start to cry; reach the mental breaking point and suffer the effects

role.descr: theme, type of breakdown (ie mental, nervous)

example.name: break_down-v
example.text: He broke down in tears once he got onto the things that had hurt him.
example.arg: once he got onto the things that had hurt him

example.name: breakdown-n: arg1
example.text: Each of these travelers appeared to have suffered from some form of nervous breakdown.

example.name: breakdown-n: arg2
example.text: This footage was taken after her breakdown into tears

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Created by Jena. No VNcls. (from break-v.11)
BREAKDOWN-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Slight comparison with break-v.11. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from breakdown-n.02)

roleset.name: break down: become damaged, cease to operate

example.name: break_down-v
example.text: law and order has broken down

example.name: break_down-v: both args
example.text: He broke down the cardboard boxes before cramming them in the recycle bin.
example.arg: before cramming them in the recycle bin

example.name: breakdown-n
example.text: There was a power breakdown

example.name: breakdown-n
example.text: His warning came after the breakdown of talks in London.

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Created by Jena. Member of VNcls break-45.1. (from break-v.12)
BREAKDOWN-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to break.12. Break.12 is a member of VN class break-45.1. Framed by Katie. (from breakdown-n.01)

roleset.name: separate into manageable sections for analysis/explanation

role.descr: thing being analyzed, separated into manageable sections

example.name: break_down-v: ergative
example.text: For 2010 , the largest budget items broke down as follows: 20 % Defense and Security · 20 % Social Security · 14 % Safety Net Programs
example.arg: as follows: 20 % Defense and Security · 20 % Social Security · 14 % Safety Net Programs

example.name: breakdown-n
example.text: Normally, the graphs in SimaPro show a breakdown of the results, showing the contribution of the top processes or product stages.

example.name: do_breakdown-l
example.text: The owners did a breakdown of his sheets one week and figured he had to be averaging sixty miles an hour on every trip to make that kind of money.

roleset.note: BREAK_DOWN-V, BREAKDOWN-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

roleset.name: cause to be not-new (as shoes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: We officially broke in the new outdoor kitchen on the back porch!
example.arg: the new outdoor kitchen on the back porch!

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from break-v.05)

roleset.name: utterance

example.name: break_in-v: sweeney
example.text: He was about to make a gas check on his flight when Todman 's voice broke in : " Sweeneys ! ! "

example.name: break_in-v: Alexander
example.text: ["That would be worse than useless "]-1 , Alexander broke in *trace*-1 .

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Brown corpus. Comparison to add.01. No VNcls. (from break-v.17)

roleset.name: cause to cease

example.name: break_off-v: agentive
example.text: Ford Motor Co. and Saab-Scania AB of Sweden broke off talks about a possible alliance after Ford officials concluded that the cost to modernize Saab's car operations would outweigh the likely return.
example.arg: Ford Motor Co. and Saab-Scania AB of Sweden
after Ford officials concluded that the cost to modernize Saab's car operations would outweigh the likely return

example.name: break_off-v: ergative
example.text: Doug Hammond, the federal mediator in Seattle, where Boeing is based, said the parties will continue to sit down daily until a new settlement proposal emerges or the talks break off again.

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from break-v.03)

roleset.name: snap off pieces

example.name: break_off-v: all args
example.text: John broke off a twig from the tree.

example.name: breaking_off-n
example.text: Then Goss distinctly heard what sounded to him like the cracking and breaking off of a tree limb.

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: See VNcls split-23.2 (from break-v.04)
BREAKING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to break.04-v. Break.04-v is a member of VN class split-23.2. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from breaking-n.02)

roleset.name: introduce

example.name: break_out-v: this is a weird usage
example.text: The company didn't break out its fourth-quarter results.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Around him , scores of traders seemed to get a burst of energy ; their boss broke out bottles of Perrier water to cool them off .

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: See VNcls appear-48.1.1. (from break-v.06)

roleset.name: develop acne

example.name: break_out-v: poor John
example.text: The very day of class pictures, John broke out.
example.arg: The very day of class pictures

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from break-v.07)

roleset.name: escape

example.name: break_out-v: figurative
example.text: `` [December delivery gold]-1 is trading in a range of $365 to $375 (an ounce) and is having difficulty [*]-1 breaking out above that,'' Mr. Savaiko said.

example.name: break_out-v: both args
example.text: Metallica broke out of the Metal underground.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: However , just when things looked bleakest , nativist drama began to break out of its previous framework with the appearance of the " river of time " structure , characterized by a cross-generational story depicting long - term social evolution in Taiwan .
example.arg: with the appearance of the " river of time " structure , characterized by a cross-generational story depicting long - term social evolution in Taiwan

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from break-v.10)

roleset.name: onset, arise

example.name: break_out-v
example.text: When civil war broke out in Spain, Hitler and Mussolini lent military support to the Nationalist rebels, led by General Francisco Franco.

example.name: outbreak-n
example.text: Palestinian security forces returned Monday to the positions they held in the Gaza Strip before the outbreak of the 33 - month Palestinian uprising as Israel removed all major checkpoints in the coastal territory , a Palestinian security source said .

roleset.note: BREAK_OUT-V, OUTBREAK-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei, which necessitated the merging of outbreak.xml into this roleset.
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

roleset.name: cause not to be together

role.descr: external agent, not part of the broken group

example.name: break_up-v: passive
example.text: One trial balloon Mr. Spiegel is said to have floated to investors : Columbia-1 might be broken up *trace*-1 , as Mellon Bank was split into a good bank and a bad bank.
example.arg: as Mellon Bank was split into a good bank and a bad bank

example.name: break_up-v: passive with pieces
example.text: Mr. Icahn has said he believes USX-1 would be worth more if *trace*-1 broken up *trace*-1 into steel and energy segments.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Ideally , businesses and popular culture want to be able to sweep everyone up in a single net , and would prefer not to break their market up by gender .

example.name: break_up-n: arg1
example.text: Mr. Andersson insists that Trelleborg and Noranda have n't discussed a Falconbridge break - up .

example.name: break_up-n: args 1, 3
example.text: The housemate was crying over his break-up with on-off girlfriend Sammi.

example.name: break_up-n: with arg0
example.text: On December 12, 1933 Connie Mack continued his break up of the A's by sending Max, Lefty Grove and George Walberg to the Boston Red Sox for $125000

example.name: break_up-v: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: He i was her second guy (i broke her up from her first bf).

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: Member of VNcls break-45.1. (from break-v.08)
BREAK-N NOTES: break.08: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. Corresponds to VNcls break-45.1. (from break-n.08)

roleset.name: not win, not lose

example.name: break_even-v
example.text: Old Stone repeated projections that it will be profitable for the fourth quarter and will about break even for the year.

roleset.note: BREAK-V NOTES: No VNcls. (from break-v.09)

roleset.name: break through a barrier, physical or abstract

example.name: breakthrough-v
example.text: Shengyou Shu , the governor of Jiangxi province , said , " In the recently ended year of 1997 , the total value of commodity exports was 1.6 billion US dollars , and every effort will be made *PRO* to breakthrough the figure of 1.8 billion US dollars this year " .
example.arg: the figure of 1.8 billion US dollars

example.name: break_through-v
example.text: Then he swam to the back of the bungalow and broke through the wall with a saucepan.

example.name: break_through-v: arg0 moves from one side of the barrier to the other
example.text: Kool Aid Man broke through plaster, wood fences, brick and even cement walls in commercials throughout the decades.
example.arg: plaster, wood fences, brick and even cement walls

example.name: breakthrough-n
example.text: Following a breakthrough in the tunnel just before the summer holiday of 1957, there was a powerful draught of mild air.
example.arg: just before the summer holiday of 1957

roleset.note: BREAKTHROUGH-V NOTES: Why? because it was treebanked that way... Roleset based on instances in ectb revisions. Framed by Claire (from breakthrough-v.01)
BREAKTHROUGH-N NOTES: Roleset based on breakthrough.01, OntoNotes grouping breakthrough-n senses 1 & 3; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from breakthrough-n.01)
BREAK-N NOTES: (from break-n.04)
'breakthrough' roleset split into two 3/18/15.

roleset.name: Eureka! Make great strides in some domain

example.name: break_through-v
example.text: With the discovery of the new drug, the scientists broke through in their fight against cancer.
example.arg: With the discovery of the new drug

example.name: breakthrough-n
example.text: New breakthroughs in medicine are happening every day.

example.name: breakthrough-n
example.text: John had a spiritual breakthrough and converted to Zen Buddhism.

example.name: breakthrough-n
example.text: This novel was her real breakthrough into the New York literary scene.
example.arg: into the New York literary scene

example.name: breakthrough-n
example.text: The labor union's concession on pay was a key breakthrough for the negotiations.

roleset.note: BREAKTHROUGH-V NOTES: Why? because it was treebanked that way... Roleset based on instances in ectb revisions. Framed by Claire (from breakthrough-v.01)
BREAKTHROUGH-N NOTES: Roleset based on breakthrough.01, OntoNotes grouping breakthrough-n senses 1 & 3; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from breakthrough-n.01)
BREAK-N NOTES: (from break-n.04)

roleset.name: out of money

example.name: video games
example.text: And now, I'm broke of virtual diamonds and money and haven't completed the second status level yet.

roleset.note: BROKE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from broke.01-j)

roleset.name: broken, with 'ass' intensifier

example.name: broken
example.text: Not sure my phone is all broke ass

roleset.note: BROKE_ASS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from broke.02-j)

roleset.name: not having any money, with 'ass' intensifier

example.name: poor
example.text: And before we go calling the mechanics hacks, the customer probably just told them to slap valves in it and throw it back together because he was broke ass.

roleset.note: BROKE_ASS-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from broke.03-j)

roleset.name: begin the construction phase of a project

example.name: break_ground-m
example.text: On East Beach , where-1 the Houston - based Falcon Group recently broke ground on two high - rise condominium buildings called Palisade Palms *-1 , the only mark of the storm was an awning that fell from the sales trailer set up at the site .
example.arg: on two high - rise condominium buildings called Palisade Palms

example.name: groundbreaking-n
example.text: Hillsboro toasts groundbreaking on new community.

roleset.note: BREAK_GROUND-V, GROUNDBREAKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

roleset.name: natural disaster: rampant spread of disease

example.name: outbreak-n: arg1
example.text: An outbreak of plague was found in the Kulinsky district of the republic of Dagestan.

example.name: outbreak-n: arg4
example.text: The Great Influenza examines the 1918 pandemic, an outbreak with a death toll of 50 to 100 million.
example.arg: with a death toll of 50 to 100 million

roleset.note: OUTBREAK-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to epidemic, pandemic. (from outbreak.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

roleset.name: cause to have overwhelming sorrow

example.name: heartbreak-n
example.text: BounceBack helps people find happiness after heartbreak from a relationship breakup or divorce.
example.arg: from a relationship breakup or divorce

example.name: heartbreak-n: args 0,1
example.text: In a new interview with his Britain's Got Talent co-star Piers Morgan, Cowell choked back tears as he described his heartbreak over the loss.

example.name: heartbreaking-j
example.text: Seeing my girlfriend in tears at 16 years old was absolutely heart - breaking for me .
example.arg: Seeing my girlfriend in tears at 16 years old

example.name: heartbroken-j
example.text: My girlfriend was heart broken .

example.name: break_heart-m
example.text: I'm not saying you broke his heart, but you did leave scars.

example.name: heartbroken-j
example.text: "I am heartbroken that today President Trump is closing the door on children, mothers and fathers fleeing violence and war," the Nobel Prize winner said in a statement posted to Facebook.
example.arg: that today President Trump is closing the door on children, mothers and fathers fleeing violence and war

roleset.note: BREAK_HEART-M NOTES: Added by Julia during MWE framing.
HEARTBREAK-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on adjectival instances (heartbreaking, heartbroken) in BOLT-4,5. (from heartbreak.01-n)
